Articles.Content:
Hello rewdew here.

I was thinking since the developer\'s are planning to add cities (maybe in a few updates maybe in a long time)

I think we should plan out where some of the cities are. and maybe name some. (if you want to make a picture of what you might think the city would look like feel free)

For example i noticed that the base of the Mountains east of the KSC. are a PERFECT place for a spread out city. (kinda like colorado springs if any of you have been there)

If you have an idea for a city feel free to place it some where and name it

like the city i\'m planning could be called Kerolado Springs. and i noticed about 80 KM north seems like an idea place for somthing like their version of new york. because it has enough room for a small bay and a large liberty island.
If there would be a small town near the space center, I\'m all for calling it 'Star City.'

How close are we talking?

Because Kerorado Springs is 40 KM away. (which is pretty far on kerbin)

and is it north, south, east, or west?
Nova Silisko will have your heads on a silver platter by the end of the week. You mark my words.
why D:>

Suggestions:

Kew Kork

Karis

Kondon

Kiami

Kokeyo

Kan Krakisko

Never mind.

(Sorry Nova)

Suggestions:

Never mind.

(Sorry Nova)

why do ppl keep mentioning nova?!

why do ppl keep mentioning nova?!

You see, Nova Silisko is quite known for his dislike of taking regular words and replacing the first letter with the letter 'k,' as you have done for Kerorado Springs. At first it was funny, but after a while most people found it quite annoying on the forums, including our friend Nova Silisko. It\'s also quite unoriginal, if I may add. Think up your own names, you\'ll have more fun than replacing letters.
We need an extremely large city in a small-ish bay, and we\'ll name it Vienna. Or Altorun. (pronounced Ahl-toe-roon)
If we involved the roleplay, both the base of the mountain and especially the bay with the island have cities i have named and taken care of since Jan 02.
okay... i guess what i can do is go on spore and click the random name generator

OR you could, you know, let your mind roll on some names?\

Like Kerzof (K has nothing to do with Kerbals here)

Or Hinoa

Just sayin\'

okay then the name of the city at the base of the mountains is

City of Kiza

okay then the name of the city at the base of the mountains is

City of Kiza

...

Have fun with that.

I\'d say taking elements of French, Latin, and various other romance languages to create names. I love how they sound. Germanic just doesn\'t work for me when talking of cities.

For instance -

Esthera

Palova

Avia

Mercenne

Cyana

etc.

Greek is useful too.

Of course, the above are absolute gibberish, but they sound nice to me.

Cool names.

I would map some out.
Aquaria (Water); Marium e Pax; Rivus e Mortuum; Excalibur de Ostri; Listi; Tiberia; Graecus; Using predominantly Roman words; Marium and Rivum is lake and river respecitvely.
Okay This is what i have so far
Hellza Ballza.

Novum Templum, could be a religious place like Olympus. (Literally means New Temple)

Or Grovanau? For an Eastern European place.
Oh wow, you placed a city called Avia there, that\'s.. humorous, don\'t mind me.

Oh wow, you placed a city called Avia there, that\'s.. humorous, don\'t mind me.

I don\'t think they\'re dividing kerbin into nations really, but treating it like one nation. I actually really like this, you know.

Well, it makes sense, I suppose, since the land area of Kerbin is only about that of the UK.

Okay, here\'s some names that haven\'t been used by anyone ever that you should totally use:

Taheireaz

Maladeireaz

Lumos

Avia

Aries

Veiid

Atlaneigo

Endela

Lunus

Molta

Quatar

Forseti

Makavi

Kolurda

Nexvulch

Antafirius

Dudinka

Takihar
*cough niblonimia coughcough* ^^
I can make a better map, with Greek and Latin names.
